title: How to see your mouse
body: Is there any possible way to fully see your mouse while playing the game? No matter what I do to make it show up I just cant see it. I know its there because if I move my mouse over something it lights up to click on it. I tried searching it up and cant find anything saying how to see it in the newest version. I am new at playing and don't know how to do this. Please help!!

replies.body:
Mouse visibility issues could be caused by a corrupt config or using a 4K which isn't currently supported.  See if resetting your config might help for this case:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

If you're on a 4k, you'll want to scale your in-game and native resolution down to 1920x1080 at most.
